name: Popular Tea Cakes Workshop
description: Popular Tea Cakes Workshops We cover a variety of  of 5 various tea cakes that we teach from scratch. We use only the best of ingredients and source everything locally. We teach you how to bake cakes and the frostings that go with it, in a tradiotional method. Its a hands on experince and we provide the students with hand outs which they will be taking home with them.-Banana Cake with Dark Chocolate Chips-Sticky Toffee Date Cake with Salted Caramel Sauce -Carrot Cake with Cream Cheese Frosting -Orange Pound Cake Looking forward to baking the world a better place!

name: Eggless Cake Making Workshop
description: Weclome to our Eggless Cake Making Workshop!We teach you to bake your cakes to perfection with giving you a product thats so flavourful, you don't feel the absence of egg at all.What will you learn?-Eggless Vanilla Sponge -Eggless Chocolate Sponge -Couverture Chocolate Ganache -Salted Caramel -Whipping of Organic fresh cream (sourced from France) -Flavour Pairings (Caramel Chocolate Cake, Black Forest Cake, Classic Chocolate Cake , Fresh Cream Fruit Cake ).We make sure you embrace the art of baking and use the skills you will learn to best use.

name: Cheesecake Workshop
description: This class is for all the cheescake lovers. Here at Flourish, we teach you a variety of cheesecakes that range with technique and flavour. Tips, tricks and methods pertaining to perfecting your cheesecake is covered in this class. A variety of 3 cheesecakes is taught.-Baked New York Cheesecake -Frozen Fruit Cheesecake -Cotton Cheesecake (Japanese Cheesecake) All information regarding the baking of these widely different cheesecake will be passed on to our students. We provide you with all the ingredients, tools and know-how for the class including a handout which you will be taking home. Along with that, you will be taking the lovely cheesecakes you've made at the class, back home to your friends and family. Join us for a fun filled, cheese-centric workshop! Cheers!

name: Brownie Workshop
description: Join us in  baking two versions of a delectable Brownie. Everything we teach you is made from scartch. Tips, tricks and techniques required to perfecting your brownie is thoroughly taught at this class. Various ways to spice up your brownie with toppings and what combination works best! You will learn-An Eggless Brownie A Brownie with Egg Both versions of the brownie is fanatstic and you can't chose which one you like more!All ingredients are provided to you including the tools! We provide you with handouts as well which you will be taking home with you along with the brownies youve made yourself! Looking forward to a delectable class filled with chocolate and fun!

name: ARAKU Open House: Coffee Around The World
description: Instant isn’t in our vocabulary; with ARAKU Coffee, slow is the way to go! In celebration of International Coffee Day, Introducing ARAKU Open House: an open-for-all invitation to explore the world of specialty coffee. This program, under ARAKU World Specialty Coffee Academy (AWSCA), aims to foster a more inclusive and accessible coffee community, one cup at a time.What to Expect:Taste Global Coffees: Taste international coffees and sample a selection of ARAKU’s finest SKUs, guided by our coffee mentor and expert, Sherri Johns. As a renowned barista trainer, Head Judge of the Gems of Araku Competition, and Authorised SCA Trainer (AST), Sherri brings a wealth of knowledge and passion to each session.Connect and Share: Immerse yourself in a vibrant community of coffee enthusiasts. Swap stories, rituals, and traditions with fellow coffee lovers from around the world, and explore how local cafes and global cultures intertwine through coffee.Who Should Attend: Coffee aficionados eager to deepen their knowledge of global coffee culture. Those curious about different coffee varieties and brewing techniques. Anyone looking to connect with a lively community of coffee enthusiasts and professionals.Spaces are limited to just 15 participants, so be sure to secure your spot at the earliest.October 1st, Tuesday | 4:30 PM OnwardsAWSCA, 1st floor, Araku Coffee, Indiranagar, Bangalore.

location.address: 968, 12th Main Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008, India

name: Wednesday Supper Club | Dine in Brazilian style
description: Step into the vibrant streets of Rio with our Wednesday Supper Club!This week, we’re heading to Boteco, a beloved spot among expats, for an evening that’s all about Brazilian flavor and Carnival flair! 🇧🇷🎉At Boteco, you'll enjoy a warm, inviting atmosphere that reflects the lively spirit of Rio. Known for its authentic Brazilian cuisine and vibrant energy, it's the perfect setting for a night where strangers become friends. 🍽️🎶Expect a night filled with:Flavor-packed Brazilian dishes that’ll make your taste buds dance the Samba. 🌮Bossa Nova rhythms that’ll have you swaying with the beat. 🎵A Carnival-inspired ambiance that’s as festive as it is fun. 🎊This evening is not just about exploring new flavors—it's also your chance to meet new people and share great conversations. Dive into mouthwatering Brazilian dishes while you mingle with fellow guests and make new friends, Boteco's lively atmosphere is the perfect place to mix, mingle, and make real connections. 🥂🤝📅 Wednesday📍 BotecoJoin us for a night where the spirit of Rio, fantastic food, and new friendships come together. Vamos fazer amigos—this is one supper club you don’t want to miss!

organizer.description: Where a small group of strangers come together for genuine conversations & spontaneous connections  over a curated meal. Guided by a host every Table is a mix of locals & newcomers sharing stories of their roots & dreams

name: Sunday Breakfast with Strangers
description: Ready to kickstart your day with a delightful twist? 🌞 Join us for a Breakfast with Strangers Table at Maverick & Farmer, where exceptional breakfast meets great company!Maverick & Farmer is known for its cozy, charming ambiance and its diverse egg options that cater to every taste. From classic Eggs Benedict 🍳 to indulgent fluffy omelettes, you’ll be treated to a breakfast feast that’s as delightful as it is satisfying. And don’t miss their exceptional coffee ☕—perfect for energizing your morning and setting the tone for a fantastic day ahead.At our Breakfast Table, we believe in the magic of meeting new faces over a delicious meal. This is your chance to step out of your comfort zone, spark engaging conversations, and perhaps make some new friends along the way. 🤝Whether you’re new to the city, looking to expand your social circle, or just enjoy making new connections, this breakfast is for you. We’ll provide the mouthwatering food, the inviting atmosphere, and plenty of conversation starters.Just bring yourself and an open mind! 🌟Can’t wait to see you at Maverick & Farmer for a morning of great food and even better company! 🎉🍽️

name: Bungee and Bites
description: Join us for a gravity-defying bungee fitness workout like never before! It will have you flying high, toning muscles, and enjoying a low-impact, high-energy workout like no other. Whether you're a fitness enthusiast or just looking to try something new, this fun and dynamic session is designed to elevate your fitness routine as you bounce, fly, and challenge your body in a whole new way.​After the workout, unwind and recharge with healthy bites, all while mingling with fellow participants. This is the perfect opportunity to make new connections in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere.​What can you expect?✨ Fun ice-breakers and an engaging playful warm-up🤸🏻‍♀️ 75 mins beginner friendly bungee workout (~800 calorie burn)🍵 Rejuvenating cup of herbal tea🥗 Protein packed salad to refuel the body🤝🏻 Interactive reflections with the group​Come for the fitness, stay for the fun, and leave with new friends and a refreshed spirit!What's Bungee Fitness?Bungee fitness is a dynamic and fun form of exercise that combines elements of traditional fitness with the added challenge and excitement of being harnessed to bungee cords. The bungee cords are attached to the ceiling, allowing participants to perform a variety of movements such as jumps, lunges, squats, and even aerial manoeuvres with reduced impact on the joints. Are you eligible?If you are above 10 years of ageIf you are not pregnant If you don't have any physical injury or medical ailmentIf you weigh less than 100 kgsWho's the instructor?He has been trained at The Tribe, Goa and has more than 3 years of bungee training experience. He's also a highly qualified dance and fitness instructor who has appeared on several TV shows.

From lively cookalongs and gourmet tastings to immersive creative activities and wellness pursuits, Jamberry Experiences offers something special for everyone.

name: Mangalore Express with chef Velton Saldanha
description: About the pop-upMangalore holds a special place in Chef Velton’s heart—it’s where he’s from and where many of his childhood summers were spent. The food of Mangalore has always been central to his memories, deeply influencing the chef he is today.Every visit to the city has been a flavorful journey, and Chef Velton’s passion for these distinct tastes has shaped his culinary identity. Now, he’s extending a special invitation to experience the soul of Mangalore through its food—showcasing textures, flavors, and elements that are often overlooked but deserve recognition.During a recent trip to Bangalore, Chef Velton reconnected with Akhila, another proud Mangalorean who shares his love for this rich cuisine. Their conversation sparked an exciting idea: to bring the essence of Mangalore to The Conservatory for one evening, celebrating the region’s bangin’ dishes with all of you.This menu is a love letter to Mangalorean cuisine, featuring everything from the classic Baffat and Kadle Bajil to the texture-forward Biscuit Roti and the flavor-packed Sukkha, not to mention the crowd-favorite ghee roast.Join us at The Conservatory as we host Chef Velton’s Mangalorean pop-up, where every dish tells a story and every bite brings you closer to the heart of Mangalore.à la carte menuVegetarian Udupi “SAMBHAR” Chaat - Rs. 300/- Mangaluru sweet spicy sambhar served with goat cheese and puli chutney. Kale and Bhel - Rs.300/- Kale salad inspired by the street style Mangaluru churumuri bhel Totally bananas - Rs.370/-Fluffy, sweet Mangalore banana buns served with a coconut chutney Goli Baje gone wild - Rs.300/- Chilli Cheese Goli baje with green chutneyAdd on Fresh truffle (Rs.200/-)Non- VegetarianCrackling Kori 65- Rs. 350/-"Crispy, fiery, and full of crunch – Crackling is the ultimate snack attack!"Chicken Sukha on tacos - Rs.350/-Classic take on a Chicken sukha with neer dosaYetti Meatball Ghee roast - Rs.500/-  Juicy prawn meatballs drenched in bold ghee roast masala – a bite of coastal blissKori roti Hokkaido Pav - Rs.450/-Traditional Kori roti all inside a pav with a Mangaluru kari on the side. Pork Ribs “BAFFAT” and Pav - Rs.550/-Succulent pork ribs smothered in bold Baffat spice, served with a side of Bombay pav. Balekai Baileys - Rs.400/-Baileys-infused banana bread blissTerms and Conditions : The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during an eventConservatory is located on the 2nd floor of courtyard which is a 44 steps climb upDo not purchase tickets from anyone other than on the ticketing platform.No-shows and cancellations are non-refundable by all means.Tickets are non-transferable and are for personal use only.Children aged 7 and above require a ticket to attend the meal. If you are bringing a child under 7, please inform us in advance, as we do not have a baby seat at the venue.The schedule is subject to change in case of an emergency or any event out of our control.Management will entertain no liability or claims arising due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Paid Valet Parking at Rs. 200 per car.The holder of this ticket grants organizers the right to use, in perpetuity, all or any part of the recording of any video or still footage made of the holder's appearance on any channel without any further approval.Please note that both vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes are prepared in the same kitchen.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

name: The Courtyard Baithak | Sitar Soirée with Sahana Banerjee
description: Sitar Soirée with Sahana Banerjee | An Evening of Hindustani Classical Instrumental RecitalAbout Courtyard BaithakThe Courtyard Baithak series is curated by tabla wizard and prodigy Trilochan Kampli, who with his uncompromising standards in music, evokes the best from every artist that he invites to perform. We are bringing musicians and audiences together on a sublime musical journey.Exclusive gatherings, quiet strains of exquisite music, and dedicated artists across selected genres - The Courtyard Baithak series promises a true classical musical experience.Please note: The ticket includes performance onlyAbout the Artist - Sahana BanerjeeMeet Sahana Banerjee, a talented sitarist with a rich musical heritage! Recognized as a child prodigy, Sahana hails from the esteemed Rampur Senia Gharana, a lineage that traces back to the legendary Mian Tansen. Her journey began at just four years old, playing the sitar under the guidance of her father, Pandit Santhosh Banerjee, a renowned maestro himself.Sahana's music blends traditional Indian classical styles with her own unique flair, creating a captivating sound that's both soulful and dynamic. She’s passionate about sharing her knowledge, conducting both online and in-person classes for students around the world, including from India, Germany, France, and beyond.Not just a performer, Sahana also actively engages in workshops and lecture-demonstrations, helping her students develop their skills and connect with the music on a deeper level. She's performed at various music festivals and even collaborated with international artists, bringing Indian classical music to new audiences.With numerous accolades under her belt, including the Ustad Bismillah Khan Yuva Award, Sahana is a true ambassador of Indian music. Whether she’s performing on stage or teaching her students, her passion for music shines through in everything she does.Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Children aged 5 and older require a ticket.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain, the event will be moved indoors.

name: 'The Truman Show' (1998) Movie Screening | Family Movie Night
description: Family Movie Night at The Studio, Courtyard, ShantinagarJoin us as we watch a series of carefully curated rare masterpieces from around the world, made just for kids. Watch this film while cozying up with your family!Given the nature of the film, we recommend it for children aged 7 and older.About the movie:This month, we’re screening The Truman Show, a clever and heartwarming film that follows Truman Burbank, a man who unknowingly lives his entire life on a reality TV show. As Truman begins to question the world around him, he sets off on a journey to discover the truth and take control of his own life. With its mix of humor, adventure, and life lessons, this film invites kids to think about curiosity, self-discovery, and the power of choice, all while keeping everyone entertained.Why Attend?Broaden Horizons with Global Tales: Dive into diverse artistic expressions through rare masterpieces curated for children.Quality Family Bonding: Embark on a cinematic journey to a new country each month, forging lasting memories and strengthening family connections.Uncover Hidden Treasures: Discover lesser-known gems handpicked for their artistic brilliance and captivating storytelling.Artistic Excellence: Immerse your child in films of unparalleled artistic merit, fueling their imagination and creativity.Safe Family Environment: Enjoy movies in a secure, family-friendly setting, ensuring a worry-free experience for kids and parents alike.Don't miss this opportunity to create lasting memories with your family while exposing your kids to the wonders of world cinema.Join us for Family Movie Night – where the magic of storytelling knows no bounds!Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.The Event is taking place at Courtyard's indoor Studio space on the second floor.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Children above the age of 3 need a ticket to attend the event.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.

name: Wine Mixer: A Wine and Cheese Tasting Experience
description: Bangalore wine lovers — we’re switching up our regular wine tasting experiences at Drink With D for edition II of a FUN new concept - Wine Mixer!Imagine a laid-back Sunday filled with delicious wines, cheese and fascinating wine stories? Come spend a chill evening getting to know fellow wine lovers in your city while discovering the fabulous new Master Selection range by Fratelli Wines with Somm Devati Mallick. Did you know they do vineyard-inspired artisanal cheese too? Come experience with a cool community how wine brings people together in the most fun ways!What to expect: 3 new wines in a brand-new look, 3 styles of vineyard-inspired cheese, and fun storytelling on what inspired this range by Fratelli + exciting interactive wine drinking games! Here's what you'll taste:WinesFratelli Master Selection WhiteFratelli Master Selection RoséFratelli Master Selection RedCheeseChenin-rinsed SunburstSyrah-rinsed GustoSangiovese leaf-aged CheddargLimited seats only, grab a spot now! Tickets at just INR 1,200!

location.address: 1085, 12th Main Rd, HAL 2nd Stage, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560008, India

organizer.name: Drink With D
organizer.description: DWD is a Sommelier-led wine consulting and wine experience brand. Join us in exploring the fascinating world of wine through fun tastings and curated experiences!

name: Books & Brews
description: Come, join us on for a reading gettogether on a Sunday. Just get a book along and read amidst other readers over freshly brewed tea with light snacks. All at the lovely HeyBrewty studio with gentle acoustics in the background! 🤗This isn't a book club but a silent reading party that brings together intentional readers. Expect to spend time with a book you've been itching to read through the week and meet book buddies to exchange nostalgic memories (and maybe swap reads with). Limited tickets are available, so book your spot soon.Get your paperback, Kindle or even a newspaper to read, or consider something new from our library. As always, there’ll be fun giveaways for you to take home! ✨📚 Get cozy with a good book alongside fellow readers💬 Jump into lively convos🍷 Enjoy a complimentary tea with a light bite📍 At HeyBrewty Wellness Studio, Ashok NagarBonus: Free Bookmark Premium membership and mementos for keepsakes!

location.address: Hotel Ajantha, 22/A, Craig Park Layout, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

organizer.name: Bookmark App
organizer.description: Bookmark is a dating app for readers. It connects people based on not just what books they like, but also other attributes and interests about their personality, distance, the relationship they are seeking, gender preferences, and more. Download and try it today!

name: The Courtyard Picnic | October Edition
description: About October PicnicJoin us under the canopy of our lush city oasis for a sun-soaked (fingers crossed!) afternoon filled with board games, wine, coffee, and irresistible picnic plates.On the menuTo be updated soon_________And don’t forget—your furry friends are welcome to join the fun too!See you at the yard for a perfect day out with great food, great coffee, and even better company. Terms and Conditions:The management is not responsible for any injury or damage that may occur during the event.No liability or claims arising from the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.Parking near the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Children above the age of 3 need a ticket to attend the event.Valet service is available at a charge of Rs. 200 per vehicle.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. If you prefer not to be featured, please inform our team.Bringing outside food into the yard area is not permitted.Tickets are non-refundable in case of cancellation or no-show.In case of rain or other unforeseen conditions, the event will be moved indoors.

name: From the Pahad to your Plate
description: As our next pop-up, we bring to you Pahad to your Plate by Yojana KhanduriYojana Khanduri, a rasoiya from the Himalayas of Uttarakhand, is celebrated for her expertise in traditional Uttarakhandi cuisine, prepared using authentic recipes and locally sourced ingredients.Join us for this special pop-up, from the Himalayas where Yojana will delight your senses with a thoughtfully crafted menu that goes beyond traditional dishes, showcasing the true depth of Uttarakhandi cuisine.MENU WELCOME DRINKGehet (light horse gram soup)STARTERSRamodi (fresh citrus+radish salad)Dal Patudi with chutney (moong pancakes with assorted chutney)Bhaang chicken (rustic chicken cooked with hemp seeds)Mutton Kachmoli  (shredded mutton with herbed salt that's eaten like a cold salad)FIRST MAINS(v) Sunta swaaley with Thechwani (crispy ragi kachori stuffed with peas, eaten with baby potato curry)(non v) Shikaar Mutton with Bedu roti (mutton cooked with typical Garwali spice mix urad dal+ ragi roti)SECOND MAINSGehet ka phanoo with red rice (ground horse gram curry tempered with pahadi spices)Mutton/chicken Chapchapa with red rice (a mild flavoured soupy stew with meat of your choice)DESSERTMeethu BhaatJhangora KheerSIDESBhaang chutneyTil ki chutneyChulu (apricot) ki chutney**Menu is subject to slight changesTerms & Conditions:Please arrive punctually.Late arrivals may miss the first few courses.Booking Fee are non-refundable under all circumstances once booked. Tickets are transferrable to a third party.No shows/ cancellations will not be refunded, but you can reschedule your booking for within the week 48hrs before your slot is due.Alcohol will not be served to guests under the age of 21No liability or claims that may arise due to the consumption or intake of any food or drink will be entertained by the management.The booking fee total includes the online transaction fee.Parking at the event premises is at the risk of the vehicle owner.Valet is available.Photographs and videos of ticket holders may be uploaded to social media. Incase you do not wish to be featured, let our team know.

location.address: 1, Palace Rd, Ambedkar Veedhi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

name: OTJF Spotlight: High Fidelity ft. Boo! Ya Watchin?
description: Join us on 29th September from 4 PM to 7 PM at the Studio at Courtyard, Shantinagar, for OTJF Spotlight, where we screen Stephen Frears' cult classic, High Fidelity. We'll be joined by the lovely Boo! Ya Watchin? in hosting a screening of the film, followed by an exploration into it's iconic soundtrack and the impact it made, and a fun quiz!The film, starring John Cusack, Jack Black, and Lisa Bonet, follows Rob, a thirty-year-old record store owner grappling with his string of failed relationships and his recent breakup with Laura, as he reflects on his life through the lens of his favorite records. Whether you've watched it before or this is your first time, we've got a super fun evening planned, and can't wait to see you there!

location.address: 105, Kengal Hanumanthaiah Rd, opp. Corporation Bank, Raja Ram Mohanroy Extension, Shanti Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560027, India

organizer.name: On the Jungle Floor LLP
organizer.description: Record Store, Music Discovery and Events

name: Food Nerd Festival - Immersives 2024 - Bangalore: All Day Pass
description: Food Nerd Festival is a celebration of all things food! So this festival is for anyone who’s obsessed with food! Whether you're a chef, foodie, flavour geek, or love to nerd out over the latest culinary trends and techniques, the Food Nerd Festival is your jam.With 4 workshops centred around the basic cooking elements, these immersives will leave you with an elevated culinary game.Salt by Chef Gautam & Bala (@gonzogarbanzo & @saltycuredpigs) (11-12:30)Guided Overview & History Of Preservation TechniquesExploring Techniques Of Pickling & Preserving In India & Around The WorldUnderstanding Curing Salts & The Science Behind ThemExpert Tips On Mastering Salt, Time, & FermentationLive Demonstration Of A Traditional Pickling TechniqueLive Demonstration Of A Meat Curing TechniqueRecipes For Pickling & Curing Bacon At HomeFat by Heena Punwani (@tiffintales, founder of Maska Bakery) (1:00-2:30)Cracking The Code Of Baking Theory: The Science Behind ItThe History Of Fats In CookingUnderstanding Different Fats In Indian BakingCookie Tasting Session Showcasing Different FatsOil Vs. Ghee: Flavor ShowdownLive Fat-Washing Cocktail DemoAcid by Payal Shah (@kobofermentery) (3:00-4:30)Exploring Indian Vinegars & Its Usage In Indian Cooking & HistoryLive Demonstration Of Vinegar Making.Breakdown Of The Science Behind The TechniqueA Vinegar-Tasting Experience of 5 vinegars.Hands-On Shrub-Based Drink MakingHeat by Chef Gresham Fernandes (@greshamfernandes) (5:00-6:30)Tracing the Journey of ChiliesThe Spice Route & Its ImpactExpert Tips on Heat and Flavor BalanceTasting Chillis Across the Scoville ScaleLive Demonstration

location.address: 105, Kengal Hanumanthaiah Rd, opp. Corporation Bank, Raja Ram Mohanroy Extension, Shanti Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560027, India

organizer.name: GOYA
organizer.description: Goya is a food & culture publication focussed on India & S Asia

name: Gogh with the Flow !!!
description: Ready to experience a serene Bengaluru morning at Cubbon Park, with kombucha in hand and art all around?The Blend Community, in collaboration with Phooling Around brings you Gogh with the Flow – an art Xperience where you canSip, Munch and Create your own version of Van Goghs art but with a twist of Bengaluru✨ whilst mingling with the artistic minds!Registrations for the free slots are now closed, but don’t worry—we’ve opened Phase 2 tickets for just ₹199! 🎟Just bring your mat, paints, and creativity!If you missed out, now’s your chance to grab your spot before they're gone. Don’t wait too long! See you there? 👀Keep Phooling Around! 🌸

location.address: Kasturba Rd, behind High Court of Karnataka, Ambedkar Veedhi, Sampangi Rama Nagara, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

organizer.name: The Blend Community
organizer.description: At Blend, we excel in spearheading innovation in Food, Fashion, and Fiction. Our portfolio comprises a diverse range of brands, and we specialize in tailoring unique experiences that seamlessly blend into their online presence.

name: Shamanic sound healing with Lifang Huang
description: Shamanic sound healing is a practice rooted in ancient spiritual traditions, where sound is used as a powerful tool for healing and transformation.  Join Taiwanese Shamanic Sound healer Lifang Huang (@lifang_sound_healer_ ) for an evening of deep sound vibrations. Lifang Creates a healing sound bath using Tibetan singing bowls Nepalese shamanic drums her voice and other instruments.We will also include a cacao ceremony which will help in your nervous system regulation. During a session, the participant typically lies down in a relaxed state while the practitioner plays the instruments in a rhythmic and intentional manner. The sounds are often rhythmic and repetitive, inducing a meditative or trance-like state that allows the participant to journey inward. This altered state of consciousness is where healing is said to occur, as the sounds help to align the mind, body, and spirit.

location.name: Copper + Cloves
location.address: 4th Floor, 167, 2nd Stage, 2nd Cross, Shankarnag Rd, Stage 2, Domlur, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560071, India

Whether you're a chef, foodie, flavour geek, or love to nerd out over the latest culinary trends and techniques, the Food Nerd Festival is your jam.With 4 workshops centred around the basic cooking elements, these immersives will leave you with an elevated culinary game.Salt by Chef Gautam & Bala (@gonzogarbanzo & @saltycuredpigs) (11-12:30)Guided Overview & History Of Preservation TechniquesExploring Techniques Of Pickling & Preserving In India & Around The WorldUnderstanding Curing Salts & The Science Behind ThemExpert Tips On Mastering Salt, Time, & FermentationLive Demonstration Of A Traditional Pickling TechniqueLive Demonstration Of A Meat Curing TechniqueRecipes For Pickling & Curing Bacon At HomeFat by Heena Punwani (@tiffintales, founder of Maska Bakery) (1:00-2:30)Cracking The Code Of Baking Theory: The Science Behind ItThe History Of Fats In CookingUnderstanding Different Fats In Indian BakingCookie Tasting Session Showcasing Different FatsOil Vs. Ghee: Flavor ShowdownLive Fat-Washing Cocktail DemoAcid by Payal Shah (@kobofermentery) (3:00-4:30)Exploring Indian Vinegars & Its Usage In Indian Cooking & HistoryLive Demonstration Of Vinegar Making.Breakdown Of The Science Behind The TechniqueA Vinegar-Tasting Experience of 5 vinegars.Hands-On Shrub-Based Drink MakingHeat by Chef Gresham Fernandes (@greshamfernandes) (5:00-6:30)Tracing the Journey of ChiliesThe Spice Route & Its ImpactExpert Tips on Heat and Flavor BalanceTasting Chillis Across the Scoville ScaleLive Demonstration

location.address: 105, Kengal Hanumanthaiah Rd, opp. Corporation Bank, Raja Ram Mohanroy Extension, Shanti Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560027, India

name: Harmony in Motion: Experience Tai Chi + Qigong for Balance + Wellness
description: Harmony in Motion: Tai Chi & Qigong for Balance and WellnessDiscover the art of mindful movement and inner balance at our Harmony in Motion experience, where ancient practices of Tai Chi and Qigong come together to promote physical and mental well-being. Through gentle, flowing movements and controlled breathing, you’ll learn to cultivate resilience, reduce stress, and improve flexibility.Whether you’re a beginner or experienced in mindful practices, this experience offers a serene and supportive environment to explore your personal journey towards greater health and balance. No prior experience in Tai Chi or Qigong is necessary, and the experience is open to all fitness levels. The 90-minute session is designed to be gentle and adaptable, allowing you to move at your own pace. Please wear comfortable, free-flowing clothing for ease of movement. If you have any injuries or health concerns, feel free to inform the facilitator, and adjustments will be made accordingly.Facilitated by Datta, an International Master Instructor with over 30 years of experience, a 6th Degree Black Belt, and certified Life Coach, this session promises a powerful connection between body, mind, and breath.

location.address: 21, 80 Feet Rd, Nirguna Mandir Layout, 4th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

organizer.name: Zuva Life
organizer.description: Zuva Life is redefining what it means to thrive across the life continuum. By rethinking purpose and reimagining living, we offer experiences that inspire people to rediscover their passions and build meaningful communities.

name: Roots of Resilience: Nurturing Mindfulness Through Gardening
description: Step into a calming space where nature and mindfulness come together in Roots of Resilience: Nurturing Mindfulness Through Gardening. This unique experience invites you to connect with the earth while cultivating resilience and well-being through the mindful practice of gardening. As you nurture plants and engage with the soil, you'll discover how the act of tending to nature can reduce stress, promote inner calm, and foster personal growth.This 90-minute experience is open to everyone, whether you’re a seasoned gardener or completely new to the practice. In a supportive and relaxing environment, you’ll learn how the simple, grounding process of gardening can help you reconnect with yourself and the world around you.Please wear comfortable, outdoor-appropriate clothing, as you’ll be engaging directly with the earth. All tools and materials will be provided. The session is gentle and can be adapted for all fitness levels, so you can participate at your own pace. If you have any health concerns or physical limitations, please inform the facilitator in advance, and adjustments will be made to ensure your comfort.While the experience is designed for all, please note that bookings are non-refundable and non-cancellable. Should you have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out to us at info@zuva.life. We look forward to sharing this grounding journey with you, helping you grow both in the garden and within yourself.
